title: Bill Of Work Control
shortDesc: The Bill of Work Control page is used to interact with individual BOWs or task cards within a BOW without leaving the page. The BOW displayed may be both scheduled and unscheduled BOW that are in a non-terminal state and are based on the userâ€™s assigned facility sphere.
description: 1.The Bill of Work Control is the central interface point for BOW execution processes and is used to concurrently interact with the following information on the multiple BOWs that satisfy the search criteria: BOW detail information, BOW materials information, BOW planning information, BOW task card assignment information, BOW task card detail information,  BOW task card materials information, BOW task card planning information, Operations information2.	Some of the information presented in the interface requires interfaces with external systems. Information acquired from external systems include: Aircraft current location, Arrival Facility, Arrival Flight Number, Arrival Station, Departure Facility, Departure Flight Number, Scheduled Arrival Time, Scheduled Departure Tim3.	The Operations Readiness is that set by the system based upon the guidance contained in the Operations Status concept. The Task Card readiness is that set by the system based upon the guidance contained in the Unscheduled Task Card concept.
